titleStmt.title: A table of the insurance office at the back-side of the Royal-Exchange, shewing the premium, or rate of insurance for brick-houses (the same to be reckoned double for timber) from one pound per annum rent to an hundred ...
titleStmt.author: Fire Office (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Milbourn, in Jewen-Street, for the gentlemen of the insurance office on the back-side of the Royal-Exchange, where these papers are to be had gratis,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..

person.persName: the gentlemen of the insurance office

place.placeName: the back-side of the Royal-Exchange, where these papers are to be had gratis
